mapper.sql: fa.id, fa.feature_id AS "featureDepot.id", fa.ffanalysis_method AS "analysisDepot.id", fa.ffanalysis_desc AS "desc", fa.create_by AS "createBy.id", fa.create_date, fa.update_by AS "updateBy.id", fa.update_date
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO feature_analysis( id, feature_id, ffanalysis_method, ffanalysis_desc, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{featureDepot.id}, #{analysisDepot.id}, #{desc}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}
)
mapper.update: UPDATE feature_analysis SET feature_id = #{featureDepot.id}, ffanalysis_method = #{analysisDepot.id}, ffanalysis_desc = #{desc}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, WHERE id = #{id}
